Nemesis Enforcer/The Oblitercons/Scattershot:

::Nemesis gave a crooked smile::
"I CLAIM HER SCALP!"

::Scattershot gave a lopsided grin::
"I get the teeth!"

::Dark One shrugged to Pyro, who shrugged back a little confused, but with a 
smile of his own::

Seeing Dracona and Plintissa running, everyone gave chase, running as they 
fired their weapons:

::Nemesis took out his missile launcher, firing off a missile at Dracona::

Raising his sub-machine gun, Dark One fired off 20 explosive rounds at 
Dracona's legs.

Pyro, transforming to dragon mode, with a 'whap' of his wings, lifted onto 
the air, firing a blast of flames.

Scattershot blasted off into the air, taking out a charge set to explode on 
impact, tossing it at Dracona's left knee.

Dark One activated his com.  <Breakdown, take everyone head towards us.  
Anyone you meet (gives a description of Plin and Drac), exterminate them>
